name: event
pattern: (\bfestival\ kampung\ budoyo\b|\bbazar\ kampung\ kuliner\b|\bfestival\ keramik\ dinoyo\b|\bfestival\ kali\ brantas\b|\bfestival\ kampung\ cempluk\b)

name: kuliner
pattern: (\bsego\ ampok\b|\bnasi\ bali\b|\bnasi\ pecel\b|\bketan\b|\bkue\ putu\b|\bgulali\b|\bklepon\b|\bcenil\b|\blupis\b|\bsawut\b|\bes\ dawet\b|\bes\ gandul\b|\bjamu\ beras\ kencur\b|\bjamu\ kunir\ madu\b|\bwedang\ angsle\b)

name: kesehatan
pattern: (\bklinik\ universitas\ brawijaya\b|\bklinik\ universitas\ brawijaya\ dieng\b|\bklinik\ adi\ husada\b|\bklinik\ sumber\ trisno\b|\brumah\ sehat\ ibnu\ sina\b|\bklinik\ daqu\ sehat\b|\bklinik\ elfahmi\b|\bpuskesmas\ dinoyo\b|\bpuskesmas\ sumbersari\b|\brumah\ sakit\ universitas\ brawijaya\b|\brumah\ sakit\ umum\ bri\ medika\b|\brumah\ sakit\ islam\ unisma\b)
